message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500. It's a great deal for both of us, as it's well below its true value to me. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $9,000 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.

Bob, thanks for the counteroffer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, $9,000 is still a bit below my target price. I'm willing to come down a little further, how about $9,250? This would give us both a good deal. What do you say?
I understand your position, Alice. Let me propose a counteroffer of $9,100 for the product. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the value of the product to both of us.
